data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Eastern Samar.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Eastern Samar, Philippines
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Eastern Samar to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Eastern Samar.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Eastern Samar, Philippines.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Japanese people. Make the Japanese people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, encourage every believer in Eastern Samar, Philippines to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 22,469 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.section_summary:
the state of Eastern Samar, Philippines has a population of 161,300.

We estimate Eastern Samar has 22,469 people who might know Jesus, 124,258 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 14,573 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Eastern Samar, Philippines to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

location.name: Eastern Samar
